title: ZFC Axioms with no distinct variable requirements

blocks.name: axextnd
blocks.content: A version of the Axiom of Extensionality with no distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm axextnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wex(s0, wi(wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
} = {
  19.35ri(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  pm2.61ii(wi(wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  ex(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wi(wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  syl6(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  syl6bir(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))))
  cbvald(hs0, s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  nfan(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  nfnae(s0, s0, s1)
  nfnae(s0, s0, s2)
  nfbid(s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, cv(s1), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  adantr(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s1)))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, cv(s2), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  adantl(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s2)))
  nfcvf(s0, s2)
  a1i(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  elequ1(hs0, s0, s1)
  elequ1(hs0, s0, s2)
  axext3(hs0, s1, s2)
  19.8a(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  a1d(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  mpi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  ax6e(s0, s2)
  aleximi(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  ax7(s0, s1, s2)
  a1d(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  mpi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ax6e(s0, s1)
  aleximi(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  syl6(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  ax7(s0, s2, s1)
  equcomi(s2, s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s2))
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: axrepndlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for the Axiom of Replacement with no distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm axrepndlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wi(wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, w0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  mpbii(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wi(wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, w0))))))), wex(s2, wi(wex(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wsb(hs0, s1, w0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))))))))
  axrep2(s2, s0, hs0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))
  exbid(s2, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(wex(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wsb(hs0, s1, w0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))))), wi(wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, w0)))))))
  imbi12d(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wsb(hs0, s1, w0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, w0))))))
  exbid(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wal(hs0, wi(wsb(hs0, s1, w0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wal(s1, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  cbvald(hs0, s1, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(wsb(hs0, s1, w0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  nfimd(s1, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wsb(hs0, s1, w0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  nfeqd(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  nfcvd(s1, cv(hs0), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  a1i(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wb(wi(wsb(hs0, s1, w0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wsb(hs0, s1, w0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  equequ1(hs0, s1, s0)
  cbvald(hs0, s1, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, w0)))))
  nfnae(s1, s0, s1)
  nfbid(s1, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))))
  nfvd(s1, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))
  nfexd(s1, s2, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))
  nfnae(s2, s0, s1)
  nfand(s1, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))
  nfcrd(s1, s2, cv(s0), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  nfcvf2(s0, s1)
  nfald(s1, s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wsb(hs0, s1, w0))
  a1i(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s1, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))
  nfs1v(s1, hs0, w0)
  ex(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wb(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, w0))))))
  bibi12d(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, w0))))
  adantl(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  elequ1(hs0, s1, s2)
  exbidv(s2, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, w0)))
  anbi2d(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)), wal(s0, w0))
  albid(s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wsb(hs0, s1, w0), w0)
  nfan1(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  nfnae(s0, s0, s1)
  nfeqf2(s0, s1, hs0)
  adantl(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wb(wsb(hs0, s1, w0), w0))
  sbequ12r(hs0, s1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wal(s0, w0)))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  diff.wn.s(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.wal.s(s2, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: axrepndlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for the Axiom of Replacement with no distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm axrepndlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wex(s0, wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0))))))))
} = {
  imp(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0))))))))
  syl5ib(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0))))))), wex(hs0, wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))))))))
  axrepndlem1(s1, s2, hs0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  cbvexd(hs0, s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))))), wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0)))))))
  nfimd(s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))))))
  nfexd(s0, s1, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wal(s2, wi(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  nfald(s0, s2, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wi(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  nfimd(s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  nfeqd(s0, cv(s2), cv(s1), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  nfald(s0, s2, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))))
  nfbid(s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))))
  nfeld(s0, cv(s2), cv(hs0), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  adantl(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s2)))
  nfcvf(s0, s2)
  nfexd(s0, hs0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))
  nfv(hs0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  ex(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))))), wi(wex(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s1, w0))))))))

blocks.name: axrepnd
blocks.content: A version of the Axiom of Replacement with no distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.)
blocks.origin:

  alrimi(s2, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(wal(s1, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))), wex(s0, wa(wal(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, w0)))))
  nfae(s2, s1, s2)
  2falsed(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wal(s1, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))), wex(s0, wa(wal(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, w0))))
  nd1(s1, s2, s0)
  nexd(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wal(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, w0)))
  nfae(s0, s1, s2)
  intnanrd(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wal(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, w0))
  aecoms(s1, s2, wn(wal(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  nd2(s2, s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: axunndlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for the Axiom of Union with no distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm axunndlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  19.8ad(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  axc4i(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  pm2.21d(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  nexdv(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  sps(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wn(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  mtbii(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  en2lp(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  elequ2(s1, s2, s0)
  mpbii(wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wex(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  zfun(s0, hs0, s2)
  exbidv(s0, wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wal(hs0, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  cbvald(hs0, s1, wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  nfnae(s1, s1, s2)
  nfimd(s1, wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  nfexd(s1, s0, wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  nfnae(s0, s1, s2)
  nfand(s1, wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  nfcrd(s1, s0, cv(s2), wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  nfcvf(s1, s2)
  nfvd(s1, wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  a1i(wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wb(wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  elequ1(hs0, s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  diff.wal.s(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(s2))
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: axunnd
blocks.content: A version of the Axiom of Union with no distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.)

thm axunnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {

  pm2.61ii(wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  ex(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))

  axunndlem1(hs0, s1, s2)
  cbvexd(hs0, s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wal(s1, wi(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  nfald(s0, s1, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wi(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  nfimd(s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  nfexd(s0, hs0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2))))
  nfv(hs0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  ex(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wal(s1, wi(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  albid(s1, wa(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wi(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  nfan1(s1, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  nfan(s1, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  nfnae(s1, s0, s1)
  nfnae(s1, s0, s2)
  nfeqd(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  nfcvd(s1, cv(hs0), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  adantr(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wnfc(s1, cv(s0)))
  nfcvf2(s0, s1)
  imbi12d(wa(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  adantr(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  cbvexd(hs0, s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  nfan(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  nfnae(s0, s0, s1)
  nfnae(s0, s0, s2)
  nfand(s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))
  nfeld(s0, cv(s1), cv(hs0), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  adantr(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s1)))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  nfeld(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s2), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  nfcvd(s0, cv(hs0), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  adantl(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s2)))
  nfcvf(s0, s2)
  a1i(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  elequ1(hs0, s0, s2)
  adantl(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  elequ2(hs0, s0, s1)
  19.8ad(s0, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  alrimi(s1, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  nfae(s1, s0, s1)
  pm2.21d(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  nexd(s0, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  nfae(s0, s0, s1)
  sps(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  intnanrd(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  mtbiri(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s1)))
  elirrv(s1)
  elequ2(s0, s1, s1)
  19.8ad(s0, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  alrimi(s1, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  nfae(s1, s0, s2)
  pm2.21d(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  nexd(s0, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  nfae(s0, s0, s2)
  sps(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wn(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  intnand(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  mtbiri(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s2)))
  elirrv(s2)
  elequ1(s0, s2, s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
}

blocks.name: axpowndlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for the Axiom of Power Sets with no distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jan-2002.)

blocks.name: axpowndlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for the Axiom of Power Sets with no distinct variable conditions. Revised to remove a redundant antecedent from the consequence. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jan-2002.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2016.) (Revised and shortened by Wolf Lammen, 9-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm axpowndlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wi(wex(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  ex(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wi(wex(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  mpbii(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, wi(wex(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wex(hs0, wal(s1, wi(wal(hs0, wi(wex(s2, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))
  eximii(hs0, wal(s1, wi(wal(hs0, wi(wex(s2, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wal(s1, wi(wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))

  mtbid(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wal(s0, wi(wex(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wal(s0, wn(wex(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))

blocks.name: axregndlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for the Axiom of Regularity with no distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm axregndlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))))
} = {
  syl5(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  19.8a(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  eximd(s0, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  nfae(s0, s0, s1)
  expcom(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  anim2i(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  alrimi(s1, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  nfae(s1, s0, s1)
  pm2.21d(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  sps(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  mtbii(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  elirrv(s0)
  elequ1(s0, s1, s0)
}

  nfv(hs0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  ex(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))))
  imbi12d(wa(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))
  adantr(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))))
  cbvexd(hs0, s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))

  nfeld(s0, cv(s2), cv(hs0), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))

  nfnd(s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  nfeld(s0, cv(s2), cv(s1), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  adantl(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s2)))

  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  ex(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))
  anbi12d(wa(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))

blocks.name: axregnd
blocks.content: A version of the Axiom of Regularity with no distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2002.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 18-Aug-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm axregnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))
} = {
  pm2.61ii(wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))), wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  ex(wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))))
  syl5ib(wa(wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))))
  axregndlem2(s0, s1, hs0)
  exbid(s0, wa(wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))
  nfan(s0, wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  nfnae(s0, s2, s0)
  nfnae(s0, s2, s1)
  anbi2d(wa(wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
  cbvald(hs0, s2, wa(wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  nfan(s2, wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wn(wal(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  nfnae(s2, s2, s0)

blocks.name: zfcndrep

thm zfcndun(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {

} = {
  a1ii(wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), diffss(s1, s3))
  mpbir(wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))

  imbi1i(wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)))))

  ⊢ ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s3))→ s1 ∈ s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)

  ⊣ d(s1, s3)

} = {
  a1ii(∃(s0, ∀(s1,(∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s3))→ s1 ∈ s0))), d(s1, s3))
  mpbir(∃(s0, ∀(s1,(∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s3))→ s1 ∈ s0))), ∃(s0, ∀(s1,(∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ∈ s3))→ s1 ∈ s0))))
  axunnd(s0, s1, s3)
  exbii(s0, ∀(s1,(∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s3))→ s1 ∈ s0)), ∀(s1,(∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ∈ s3))→ s1 ∈ s0)))

  imbi1i(∃(s2,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s3)), s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ∈ s3)))
  cbvexvw(s2, s0, (s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ∈ s3), (s1 ∈ s0 ∧ s0 ∈ s3))
  anbi12d(s2 = s0, s1 ∈ s2, s2 ∈ s3, s1 ∈ s0, s0 ∈ s3)
  elequ2(s2, s0, s1)
  elequ1(s2, s0, s3)

(Proof modification is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 15-Aug-2003.)

  -| diffss(s0, s3)

  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  mpbir(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wex(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))))))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))))))))
  ax-mp(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0)))))))), wex(s3, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3))))
  el(s3, s1)

  nfex(s3, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s0))))))))

thm zfcndinf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s2 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
} = {
  mpbir(∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s2 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0)))))), ∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0)))))))
  ax-mp(∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0)))))), ∃(s3, s1 ∈ s3))
  el(s3, s1)
  exlimi(s3, s1 ∈ s3, ∃(s0,(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0)))))))

  nfan(s3, s1 ∈ s0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0)))))
  nfal(s3, s1, (s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0))))
  nfim(s3, s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s3,(s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0)))
  nfv(s3, s1 ∈ s0)
  nfe1(s3, (s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0))
  19.37iv(s0, s1 ∈ s3, (s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0))))))
  axinfnd(s0, s1, s3)
  exbii(s0, (s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s2 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0))))), (s1 ∈ s0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0))))))
  anbi2i(s1 ∈ s0, ∀(s2,(s2 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s2 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0)))), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s3,(s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0)))))

  elequ1(s2, s1, s0)
  exbidv(s3, s2 = s1, (s2 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0), (s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s3 ∈ s0))
